channel.title: 99 smithing?
channel.description: Some one do the math for making bolts all the way to 99... ill make mith until i can make addy then addy until i can make rune and tell me how much money i will lose :)

item.title: 99 smithing?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

exe626:

35k battle staffs? That would require a lot of before hand work. How long do you think it’ll take to get that many battle staffs?

Actually, scratch that idea. I just found out that the only ways to get battlestaffs is from zaff and from the guy on lunar isle. Well, the guy on lunar isle sells them at a starting price of 8.4k each (not unlimited) and zaff has been updated. Zaff will only sell you 8 of them for 7k each every couple hours or so. Thanks jagex, you just ruined one of the best money makers in the game with your varrock update!

Read full topic

item.title: 99 smithing?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:12, topic:181748”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=243308.msg2060215#msg2060215 date=1203301642]And I just calculated that battlestaffs in two weeks could get you a towering 63-65m.
[/quote]But- how much do you spend and make back?[/quote]

64-65m is pure profit. You can start with any amount- 8k if you wanted to. Here, this is what I am currently attempting to do:

nature rune: 290
cosmic rune: 160
battlestaff: 7000

total price: 7450
alchemy : 9300

profit : 1850

to make :35000

total profit - 64,750,000

Battlestaves require a lot of work, but they are totally worth it. If you can do a trip of 13 every 2 minutes, 35k is easily possible in two weeks. Do a 1k quota every weeknight and a 12.5k quota every weekend.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 smithing?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

pk4pk:

Just not seeing why you need smithing badly. I’d do 90 woodcut to make 100k every 30mins off magic logs. Oh and you save a couple mil that you wont even waist. And you make lots at the same time ^^

I already have a account with 91 woodcut that got banned and it is a boring skill.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 smithing?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:3, topic:181748”]Buying all the bars? At once?

Assuming you have level 53(136,594 exp) in smithing, you would make 17,127 mithril bolt heads to get from 53 to 73.

1 Bar = 10 mith heads.
17,127 mith heads = 1,722 bars.

From level 73(992,895 exp), you would make 54,287 adamant bolt heads to get from 73 to 88.

1 Bar = 10 adamant heads.
54,287 adamant heads = 5,429 bars.

From level 88(4,385,776 exp), you would make 115,316 rune bolt heads to get from 88 to 99.

1 Bar = 10 rune heads.
115,316 rune heads = 11,532 bars.

I highly suggest you take another route to 99.[/quote]

im just going to go for 80 smithing.

Read full topic

Well all you need to do is know the prices for
mithril bolts + adamant bolts + rune bolts
mithril bars + adamant bars + rune bars

Then check how much you lose per bar etc…

item.title: 99 smithing?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Buying all the bars? At once?

Assuming you have level 53(136,594 exp) in smithing, you would make 17,127 mithril bolt heads to get from 53 to 73.

1 Bar = 10 mith heads.
17,127 mith heads = 1,722 bars.

From level 73(992,895 exp), you would make 54,287 adamant bolt heads to get from 73 to 88.

1 Bar = 10 adamant heads.
54,287 adamant heads = 5,429 bars.

From level 88(4,385,776 exp), you would make 115,316 rune bolt heads to get from 88 to 99.

1 Bar = 10 rune heads.
115,316 rune heads = 11,532 bars.

I highly suggest you take another route to 99.
